Package Server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
ocsf.server.AbstractServer
Server.Server
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class Server extends AbstractServer
This class overrides some of the methods in the abstract superclass in order to give more functionality to the server.
Version:
July 2000
Author:
Dr Timothy C. Lethbridge, Dr Robert Laganière, François Bélanger, Paul Holden

  • Constructor Details

    • Server

      private Server(int port, ServerPortController serverController, Connection dbConn)
      Constructs a new Server instance with the specified port, server controller, and database connection.
      Parameters:
      port - the port number on which the server listens for connections
      serverController - the controller used to update the server status and connected clients in the GUI
      dbConn - the database connection to use for processing client requests

  • Method Details

    • handleMessageFromClient

      protected void handleMessageFromClient(Object msg, ConnectionToClient client)
      Handles messages received from clients. The method processes different types of requests based on the ClientRequest enum and performs corresponding actions.
      Specified by:
      handleMessageFromClient in class AbstractServer
      Parameters:
      msg - the message received from the client (ClientRequestDataContainer)
      client - the client that sent the message

    • sendToSpecificClient

      public void sendToSpecificClient(int customerID, String msg)
      Sends a message to a specific client identified by their customer ID.
      Parameters:
      customerID - the unique identifier of the client to whom the message should be sent
      msg - the message to be sent to the client

    • customerLogoutRemoveFromMap

      private void customerLogoutRemoveFromMap(ConnectionToClient client)
      Handles the process of logging out a customer and removing their connection from the client map.
      Parameters:
      client - the `ConnectionToClient` object representing the client's connection to be logged out

    • handleUpdateCustomerWallet

      private void handleUpdateCustomerWallet(Order order, Float walletUsedAmount, ConnectionToClient client) throws SQLException
      Handles the process of updating a customer's wallet balance based on an order and the amount used, and sends a response to the client.
      Parameters:
      order - the `Order` object containing information about the order related to the wallet update
      walletUsedAmount - the amount deducted from the customer's wallet
      client - the `ConnectionToClient` object representing the client to whom the response will be sent
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while updating the wallet balance in the database

    • handleUpdateOrderAndItem

      private void handleUpdateOrderAndItem(Order order, Map<ItemInOrder,Integer> receivedCart, ConnectionToClient client) throws SQLException
      Handles the process of updating an order and its associated items in the database, and sends a response to the client.
      Parameters:
      order - the `Order` object containing information about the order to be updated
      receivedCart - a map where keys are `ItemInOrder` objects representing items in the order, and values are integers representing the quantities of those items
      client - the `ConnectionToClient` object representing the client to whom the response will be sent
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while updating the order and items in the database

    • handleUpdateItemRequest

      private void handleUpdateItemRequest(Item item, ConnectionToClient client)
      Handles the process of updating an item's information in the database and sends the response to the client.
      Parameters:
      item - the `Item` object containing updated information about the item
      client - the `ConnectionToClient` object representing the client to whom the response will be sent
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while updating the item information in the database

    • handleGetFullItemsListRequest

      private void handleGetFullItemsListRequest(Integer supplierID, ConnectionToClient client)
      Handles the request to retrieve the full list of items for a specified supplier and sends the response to the client.
      Parameters:
      supplierID - the ID of the supplier for whom the full list of items is requested
      client - the `ConnectionToClient` object representing the client to whom the response will be sent
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while retrieving the item list from the database

    • handleGetItemsListRequest

      private void handleGetItemsListRequest(Integer supplierID, ConnectionToClient client)
      Handles the request to retrieve a list of items for a specified supplier and sends the response to the client.
      Parameters:
      supplierID - the ID of the supplier for whom the list of items is requested
      client - the `ConnectionToClient` object representing the client to whom the response will be sent
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while retrieving the item list from the database

    • handleAddItemData

      private void handleAddItemData(Item item, ConnectionToClient client)
      Handles the request to add a new item to the database and sends the response to the client.
      Parameters:
      item - the `Item` object containing the data to be added to the database
      client - the `ConnectionToClient` object representing the client to whom the response will be sent
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while adding the item to the database

    • handleRemoveItemData

      private void handleRemoveItemData(Map<String,Integer> itemData, ConnectionToClient client)
      Handles the request to remove an item from the database and sends the response to the client.
      Parameters:
      itemData - a map containing the item data required to identify and remove the item from the database.
      client - the `ConnectionToClient` object representing the client to whom the response will be sent.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while removing the item from the database.

    • handleGetOrdersData

      public void handleGetOrdersData(Integer supplierID, ConnectionToClient client)
      Handles the request to fetch orders data for a specific supplier and sends the response to the client.
      Parameters:
      supplierID - the ID of the supplier for whom the orders data is to be fetched.
      client - the `ConnectionToClient` object representing the client to whom the response will be sent.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while sending the response to the client.

    • fetchDataForReport

      public static ServerResponseDataContainer fetchDataForReport(LocalDate startOfLastMonth, LocalDate endOfLastMonth, String branch)
      Fetches data for a report based on the specified date range and branch.
      Parameters:
      startOfLastMonth - the start date of the last month for which the report data is to be fetched.
      endOfLastMonth - the end date of the last month for which the report data is to be fetched.
      branch - the branch for which the report data is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      a ServerResponseDataContainer containing the fetched report data.

    • insertDataForReport

      public static void insertDataForReport(HashMap<String,Integer> data, String branch, int year, int month)
      Inserts data for a report into the database.
      Parameters:
      data - is a HASHMAP containing the report data, where the keys are data labels and the values are the corresponding numerical data to be inserted.
      branch - the branch associated with the report data.
      year - the year associated with the report data.
      month - the month associated with the report data.

    • fetchDataForPerformanceReport

      public static ServerResponseDataContainer fetchDataForPerformanceReport(LocalDate startOfLastMonth, LocalDate endOfLastMonth, String branch)
      Fetches performance report data from the database.
      Parameters:
      startOfLastMonth - the start date of the reporting period, which is the beginning of the last month.
      endOfLastMonth - the end date of the reporting period, which is the end of the last month.
      branch - the branch for which the performance report data is to be fetched.
      Returns:
      a ServerResponseDataContainer containing the fetched performance report data.

    • insertDataForPerformanceReport

      public static void insertDataForPerformanceReport(HashMap<String,Integer> data, String branch, int year, int month) throws SQLException
      Inserts performance report data into the database.
      Parameters:
      data - is a HASHMAP containing the performance report data, where keys are data labels and values are corresponding integers.
      branch - the branch to which the performance report data belongs.
      year - the year for which the performance report data is being inserted.
      month - the month for which the performance report data is being inserted.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error accessing the database.

    • fetchDataForIncomeReport

      public static ServerResponseDataContainer fetchDataForIncomeReport(LocalDate startOfLastMonth, LocalDate endOfLastMonth, String branch)
      Fetches income report data from the database for the specified period and branch.
      Parameters:
      startOfLastMonth - the start date of the last month for which income report data is being fetched.
      endOfLastMonth - the end date of the last month for which income report data is being fetched.
      branch - the branch for which income report data is being fetched.
      Returns:
      a ServerResponseDataContainer containing the income report data.

    • insertDataForIncomeReport

      public static void insertDataForIncomeReport(List<SupplierIncome> data, String branch, int year, int month) throws SQLException
      Inserts income report data into the database for the specified month and year.
      Parameters:
      data - is a LIST of SupplierIncome objects containing the income report data to be inserted.
      branch - the branch for which the income report data is being inserted.
      year - the year for which the income report data is being inserted.
      month - the month for which the income report data is being inserted.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error while interacting with the database.

    • importCustomerSimulation

      public static void importCustomerSimulation(String path) throws SQLException
      Imports a list of customers from a specified file and inserts them into the database.
      Parameters:
      path - the file path where the customer data is located.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error while interacting with the database, or FilePath problems

      public static void setAllUsersLoggedOut() throws SQLException
      Marks all users as logged out in the database.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error while interacting with the database.

    • startServer

      public static boolean startServer(DBConnectionDetails db, Integer port, ServerPortController serverController)
      Starts the server with the specified database connection details, port, and server controller.
      Parameters:
      db - the database connection details
      port - the port number on which the server listens for connections
      serverController - the controller used to update the server status and connected clients in the GUI
      Returns:
      true if the server starts successfully, false otherwise

    • handleClientConnection

      private void handleClientConnection(ConnectionToClient client)

    • clientConnected

      protected void clientConnected(ConnectionToClient client)
      Called when a client connects to the server. Updates the server controller with the client's information and sends a message to the client with their connection details.
      Overrides:
      clientConnected in class AbstractServer
      Parameters:
      client - the client that has connected

    • clientDisconnected

      protected void clientDisconnected(ConnectionToClient client)
      Called when a client disconnects from the server. Updates the server controller to remove the client's information.
      Overrides:
      clientDisconnected in class AbstractServer
      Parameters:
      client - the client that has disconnected

    • serverStarted

      protected void serverStarted()
      This method overrides the one in the superclass. Called when the server starts listening for connections.

    • serverStopped

      protected void serverStopped()
      This method overrides the one in the superclass. Called when the server stops listening for connections.
